channel.title: Npc Facing...[525]
channel.description: on my server i have a problem with the players, cause when players attacks , npc, dummys, and other things, they dont face at the npc/dummy, they just stand and hit in the air, but they still damage ofc. how can i fix so when you attack you face against the dummy/npc? :=)
